title: Champion
body: I was wondering who i should get, I want to get Camille, Aurelion Sol and Azir, but i can only get one at the moment, I like high damage champs, but Aurelion looks fun, so i need help. Thanks x)

replies.body: These champs are very difficult and require very high knowledge of the game. The easiest being camille though. I would advise against aurelion sol due to his requirement of high mastery on the champ to do pretty much anything in games. But in the end you will need to give each one of these champs a solid amount of practice, time and research to use them properly! Good luck!

Aurelion Sol is really fun, but Camille is a really fun one too! If you don't mind getting all up in the enemies face then she's a great choice! Plus she has those saber legs that. You could always wait for the free rotation to roll around and give each one a try. It's likely they will all go through the rotation for you to play :)
